body: All the buttons for the audio effects play the sounds!

The buttons still appear stretched on the landscape layout:

![Screen Shot 2017-05-20 at 00.23.55.png](https://udacity-reviews-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/_attachments/1392/1495229232/Screen_Shot_2017-05-20_at_00.23.55.png)

You can fix this by setting the content mode of each button to ```Aspect Fit```:

```
snailButton.imageView?.contentMode = .scaleAspectFit
chipMunkButton.imageView?.contentMode = .scaleAspectFit
rabbitButton.imageView?.contentMode = .scaleAspectFit
stopButton.imageView?.contentMode = .scaleAspectFit
..etc.
```
